title: Domains
description: Manage your domain names, DNS and redirections.

empty.title: Select a domain
empty.description: Choose a domain from the list to view its details.

zone.title: DNS Zone
zone.description: Manage DNS records for your domain.

dns.title: DNS Servers
dns.description: DNS servers configured for your domain.

dynhost.title: DynHost
dynhost.emptyHint: DynHost allows you to automatically update the IP of your subdomains.
dynhost.explanation: DynHost allows you to point a subdomain to a dynamic IP address. The IP is automatically updated via a DynDNS client.

glue.title: Glue Records
glue.description: Glue records for your DNS servers.
glue.emptyHint: Glue Records are necessary if you use DNS servers under your own domain.
glue.explanation: A Glue Record resolves the circular dependency when your DNS servers are hosted under your own domain (e.g., ns1.example.com for example.com).

dnssec.title: DNSSEC
dnssec.enabledDesc: DNSSEC is enabled on this domain. DNS responses are cryptographically signed.
dnssec.disabledDesc: DNSSEC is disabled. Enable it to secure your DNS records.
dnssec.unsupported: DNSSEC is not supported for this domain.
dnssec.explanation: DNSSEC (DNS Security Extensions) adds a security layer to DNS by cryptographically signing records, preventing cache poisoning attacks.

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.description: Operations in progress on your domain.
